ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
ygData.msgSnippet: HEHE, my first thought to was try on yourself but if you aren t the adventurist type you can watch your spells.  You will get a message mob blood begins to
ygData.messageBody:
HEHE,
my first thought to was try on yourself but if you aren't the adventurist
type you can watch your spells. You will get a message "mob blood begins to
boil" or you'll get a message saying" your spell does not take hold" .
Usually the spells will stack as long as not the same type IE clinging
darkness will not stack with engulfing darkness . As with every rule there
are exceptions IE if rooted you cant get darkness to stick .. you'll see
message "your spell does not take hold" .

It just takes some practice and depends on which casters your grouping with
on what spells you can use, Especialy with other necros, who are spells do
not stack with very well.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
50th Tunare



<<
Try them on yourself, sure fired way to find out.


--- John Chiodo <chiodo@...> wrote:
> I am level 18 and using the lvl 16 spells. My
> question is out of all the DOT types spells which
> ones stack? I am using blood boil, leech, engulfing
> darkness and heart flutter. How can I tell if they
> are
> stacking or canceling one another? With new spells
> coming
> soon my spell bar is already crowded.
>
> The only thing I have read is engulfing darkness and
> blood boil stack? but I'm not sure.
>
> Ommin
> lvl 18 Erudite Necro
> E`ci >>
